Package gw.solr.mapper.query

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractEncoder
    DefaultEncoder
    Simple search value encoder that converts "special" characters to whitespace and then compresses each whitespace block into a single 'space. Use for encoding term queries, such as roles or phone numbers. For edismax subqueries, use PhraseEncoder.
    DefaultTagHandler
    Simple tag handler that detects tags according to the rules in {@link gw.solr.mapper.query.MatchTypeUtil}
    ISolrQueryEncoder
    Custom encoders should implement this interface
    ISolrQueryTagHandler
    Custom tag handlers should implement this interface
    MatchTypeUtil
    Simple tag definitions to allow narrowing of certain search terms when placed at the end of a search criteria string. -e : exact match only : prefix match only -n : synonym (nickname) match only -p : phonetic match only e.g. Searching on "Fred-e" will only score exact matches for "Fred" while ignoring prefix matches such as "Frederick" and nickname matches such as "Alfred" Tag handlers are optional and must be explicitly specified in the query section of the search configuration file for the associated Solr document.
    PhraseEncoder
    Simple search value encoder that converts "special" characters to whitespace and then compresses each whitespace block into a single '+' sign (so edismax performs distinct term queries on the implied terms entered by the user).
    SearchTag
